text: A Huge hill in the centre of Polur, Tamil Nadu, India. This hill has been dedicated to lord Narasimha and a temple had been constructed in ancient times on the hill. Many celebrities and personalities have visited this temple and donated for its renovation. South Indian actor Sivaji Ganesan donated a huge amount for the renovation of the steps to the temple in the hill. Category:Hills of Tamil Nadu Category:Tiruvannamalai district
title: Sampathgiri
